casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Paul Dwayne SCOTT, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158942, 158943
COA: 340750, 340761 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 22, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to file a reply in excess of the page limitation is GRANTED. The 25-page reply submitted on March 20, 2019, is accepted for filing.
